content: **materials ** * daisy mercerized crochet cotton art 65 size 30 - 22 skeins white *or* * daisy mercerized crochet cotton art 97 size 30 - 31 balls white *or* * lily mercrochet cotton art 161 size 30 - 37 balls white * steel crochet hook no 13 **gauge ** with daisy 6 sps = 1 inch 6 row = 1 inch rose panel width 6-1/2 inches 16 5 cm when blocked with mercrochet 7 sps = 1 inch 7 row = 1 inch panel width 5-3/4 inches 14 6 cm blocked **size ** 60 x 80 inches 152 x 203 cm 9 panels wide with 12 patterns in each panel
